generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground towards the background under an overpass.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by poles and with pedestrians walking on it.
- building: A white building with multiple windows is visible in the background on the right side of the road.
- wall: A concrete wall with graffiti is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the right side of the road, running along the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and those along the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing down is visible in the middle of the road. A pedestrian crossing sign is also visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the left side of the road, near the curb.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the trees in the background.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including pedestrians walking on the sidewalk and crossing the road.
- car: A green car is visible parked on the left side of the road, and another car is visible further down the road.
